description: Timely Wills is a comprehensive platform designed to simplify the process of creating and managing essential legal documents, such as wills and powers of attorney. With its user-friendly interface and a range of features, it enables individuals to easily navigate the complexities of estate planning and ensure that their wishes are clearly documented and legally binding.
requirements: Send emails to users with custom templates
Users can pay by promo codes or get discounts
Users can buy a promo code and send it to a relative via email
PDF generation with flexible templates and various datasets
Users can update documents for 1 year free (then subscription is required)
Generated documents are stored in file storage
Users can access all of their documents and upload signed versions
Users can delete and restore their account
results: As a result of my work as a Back-End Developer at Timely Wills, I transformed a concept into a fully functional, intelligent, and user-friendly platform. SendGrid was used for sending emails, Stripe processed payments, AWS handled deployment and file storage, and PDF generation was implemented via the PDF generator API.
